Specific Instructions:

Skills Alignment: Identify the skills mentioned in the job description and add them to the appropriate section of my resume. Ensure the skills are accurately represented and highlight any relevant experiences that demonstrate proficiency in these skills. Professional Experience: Adjust the descriptions of my previous job roles to better match the responsibilities and requirements outlined in the job description. Emphasize achievements and experiences that are most relevant to the new role. Write 6 points for this section.
